items.sentence: It turns out that we didn't need to do that anyway.
I've told you a billion times to stop exaggerating.
How do you like your coffee, with or without sugar?
Honesty is the first chapter of the book of wisdom.
Whales are very large mammals that live in the sea.
The weather forecast said there'd be rain all week.
I hope the next time will be better than last time.
How often do you buy new clothes for your children?
Tom bought a new wallet and threw his old one away.
Tom dreamed that he would one day walk on the moon.
